Quote.Author: Irvine Welsh
Quote.QuoteValue: What worries me is the professionalism of everything

Quote.Author: Irvine Welsh
Quote.QuoteValue: Writing is about culture and should be about everything. That's what makes it what it is

Quote.Author: Irvine Welsh
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that every project offers an opportunity to reinvent process as well as content

Quote.Author: Irvine Welsh
Quote.QuoteValue: It's been a good thing for me to try and understand America

Quote.Author: Irvine Welsh
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone needs some kind of compelling drama in their life, basically

Quote.Author: Irvine Welsh
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of my characters are anti-heroes that became heroes

Quote.Author: Irving Berlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is 10 percent what you make it, and 90 percent how you take it

Quote.Author: Irving Berlin
Quote.QuoteValue: The toughest thing about success is that you've got to keep on being a success

Quote.Author: Irving Berlin
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no business like show business

Quote.Author: Irving Berlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Never hate a song that's sold a half million copies

Quote.Author: Irving Berlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Talent is only the starting point

Quote.Author: Irving Berlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody ought to have a lower East Side in their life

Quote.Author: Irving Berlin
Quote.QuoteValue: There is an element of truth in every idea that lasts long enough to be called corny

Quote.Author: Irving Berlin
Quote.QuoteValue: I got lost but look what I found

Quote.Author: Irving Berlin
Quote.QuoteValue: After you get what you want you don't want it

Quote.Author: Irving Berlin
Quote.QuoteValue: You're not sick you're just in love

Quote.Author: Irwin Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: A writer has to live with a sense of honor

Quote.Author: Irwin Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: My attitudes have changed, but somebody would have to read all my books to find out how they have

Quote.Author: Irwin Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: A good editor understands what you're talking and writing about and doesn't meddle too much

Quote.Author: Irwin Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: Writing for the theater, you find yourself living a nocturnal life

Quote.Author: Irwin Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not as hopeful as I was when I was young

Quote.Author: Irwin Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: At the height of the McCarthy period, writers were being hounded

Quote.Author: Irwin Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: Kennedy was a man who liked writers and even I got invited to the White House

Quote.Author: Irwin Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: People who light up like Roman candles come down in the dark very quickly

Quote.Author: Irwin Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: Curiously, the United States is full of writers who have one big work in their life and that's all

Quote.Author: Irwin Shaw
Quote.QuoteValue: I've gone on the wagon, but my body doesn't believe it

Quote.Author: Irwin Winkler
Quote.QuoteValue: I found 'Celebrity Gangster' intense, dramatic, a real page turner

Quote.Author: Irwin Winkler
Quote.QuoteValue: We all know we have a prescribed amount of time on Earth. We just don't know how much

Quote.Author: Irwin Winkler
Quote.QuoteValue: The thing that's strange about Frank Vincent is that actors of his quality are usually big stars

Quote.Author: Irwin Winkler
Quote.QuoteValue: I just think there's a general interest in the world of computers

Quote.Author: Irwin Winkler
Quote.QuoteValue: I have an Oscar on my mantel

Quote.Author: Irwin Winkler
Quote.QuoteValue: If you look at successful studios, they're the ones with stabilized management

Quote.Author: Irwin Winkler
Quote.QuoteValue: Believe me, it would be a long, long, cold day before I decide to warm up next to Rupert Murdoch

Quote.Author: Irwin Winkler
Quote.QuoteValue: It wasn't easy getting 'GoodFellas' started

Quote.Author: Irwin Winkler
Quote.QuoteValue: Boxing is one of the few sports that is one on one

Quote.Author: Irwin Winkler
Quote.QuoteValue: Every film I do, I'm involved with from the very conception of the project

Quote.Author: Isaac Bashevis Singer
Quote.QuoteValue: I did not become a vegetarian for my health, I did it for the health of the chickens

Quote.Author: Isaac Bashevis Singer
Quote.QuoteValue: The analysis of character is the highest human entertainment

Quote.Author: Isaac Bashevis Singer
Quote.QuoteValue: Kindness, I've discovered, is everything in life

Quote.Author: Isaac Bashevis Singer
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes love is stronger than a man's convictions

Quote.Author: Isaac Bashevis Singer
Quote.QuoteValue: We have to believe in free-will. We've got no choice

Quote.Author: Isaac Bashevis Singer
Quote.QuoteValue: For those who are willing to make an effort, great miracles and wonderful treasures are in store

Quote.Author: Isaac Bashevis Singer
Quote.QuoteValue: Our knowledge is a little island in a great ocean of nonknowledge

Quote.Author: Isaac Bashevis Singer
Quote.QuoteValue: We must believe in free will, we have no choice

Quote.Author: Isaac Bashevis Singer
Quote.QuoteValue: If you keep saying things are going to be bad, you have a good chance of being a prophet

Quote.Author: Isaac Bashevis Singer
Quote.QuoteValue: Every creator painfully experiences the chasm between his inner vision and its ultimate expression

Quote.Author: Isaac D'Israeli
Quote.QuoteValue: The wisdom of the wise, and the experience of ages, may be preserved by quotation

Quote.Author: Isaac D'Israeli
Quote.QuoteValue: The Self-Educated are marked by stubborn peculiarities

Quote.Author: Isaac D'Israeli
Quote.QuoteValue: It is a wretched taste to be gratified with mediocrity when the excellent lies before us

Quote.Author: Isaac D'Israeli
Quote.QuoteValue: The wise make proverbs, and fools repeat them

Quote.Author: Isaac D'Israeli
Quote.QuoteValue: The act of contemplation then creates the thing created

Quote.Author: Isaac D'Israeli
Quote.QuoteValue: The defects of great men are the consolation of the dunces

Quote.Author: Isaac D'Israeli
Quote.QuoteValue: Enthusiasm is that secret and harmonious spirit which hovers over the production of genius

Quote.Author: Isaac D'Israeli
Quote.QuoteValue: Quotations, like much better things, has its abuses

Quote.Author: Isaac D'Israeli
Quote.QuoteValue: Fortune has rarely condescended to be the companion of genius

Quote.Author: Isaac D'Israeli
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who do not read criticism will rarely merit to be criticised

Quote.Author: Isaac Hanson
Quote.QuoteValue: But anyone who knows anything about the music industry knows it's not only about the music

Quote.Author: Isaac Hanson
Quote.QuoteValue: People my age don't always know where their music comes from

Quote.Author: Isaac Hanson
Quote.QuoteValue: Actually, I don't think there's anyone that represents the artists, except the artists themselves

Quote.Author: Isaac Hanson
Quote.QuoteValue: Christmas albums are not something you do frequently

Quote.Author: Isaac Hanson
Quote.QuoteValue: There are very few people who have done more than one Christmas album

Quote.Author: Isaac Hanson
Quote.QuoteValue: I think downloading is both saving and killing the music industry at the same time

Quote.Author: Isaac Hanson
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the things I want to do as an artist is to connect generations

Quote.Author: Isaac Hanson
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoyed making this album a lot because of the knowledge we acquired over the last 3 years

Quote.Author: Isaac Hanson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm doing what I do for the right reasons. I love the music that I make

Quote.Author: Isaac Hanson
Quote.QuoteValue: We've sold over 100,000 records so far, and we're an independent label

Quote.Author: Isaac Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: If you enjoy the fragrance of a rose, you must accept the thorns which it bears

Quote.Author: Isaac Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: Religious beliefs are sacred to people, and at all times should be respected and honoured

Quote.Author: Isaac Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the kids today need to hear more about morals and values

Quote.Author: Isaac Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: Self-expression is always a right, but it's still not there to be abused

Quote.Author: Isaac Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: Know the business, learn the business, own something

Quote.Author: Isaac Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: Guys in slavery sang praises to the Lord to deliver them from bondage

Quote.Author: Isaac Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to stand in front of the mic and cry

Quote.Author: Isaac Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: I influence people, hopefully on the positive side

Quote.Author: Isaac Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: I love music

Quote.Author: Isaac Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: Elvis was a giant and influenced everyone in the business

Quote.Author: Isaac Herzog
Quote.QuoteValue: Auschwitz will forever remain the black hole of the entire human history

Quote.Author: Isaac Herzog
Quote.QuoteValue: Jews cannot be apathetic when hundreds of thousands of refugees are searching for safe haven

Quote.Author: Isaac Herzog
Quote.QuoteValue: I am sure of my ability to form a good government

Quote.Author: Isaac Herzog
Quote.QuoteValue: After a long period of division, I will unite Israel

Quote.Author: Isaac Herzog
Quote.QuoteValue: I agree that a nuclear Iran is extremely dangerous, and I believe that it must be prevented

Quote.Author: Isaac Herzog
Quote.QuoteValue: Iran is a rogue state, a dangerous state. Iran spreads hatred all over the world

Quote.Author: Isaac Herzog
Quote.QuoteValue: Whoever wants Yesh Atid in the government has to vote for us - there's no other choice

Quote.Author: Isaac Herzog
Quote.QuoteValue: We have to build an iron wall to protect Israel

Quote.Author: Isaac Herzog
Quote.QuoteValue: No Israeli leader will accept a nuclear Iran

Quote.Author: Isaac Herzog
Quote.QuoteValue: Housing is the number one problem facing the citizens of Israel

Quote.Author: Isaac Mizrahi
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone asks, Will he make it, will she make it? You never make it

Quote.Author: Isaac Mizrahi
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm so involved in melancholy

Quote.Author: Isaac Mizrahi
Quote.QuoteValue: This is what I like about being a designer: You can't really get it until you see it

Quote.Author: Isaac Mizrahi
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I'm really dressed up, and it really turns me on

Quote.Author: Isaac Mizrahi
Quote.QuoteValue: You know who a role model for me is? George Ballanchine

Quote.Author: Isaac Mizrahi
Quote.QuoteValue: When someone says you can't do what you know you can do, then you can't do anything

Quote.Author: Isaac Mizrahi
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to offend people

Quote.Author: Isaac Mizrahi
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a lot of obligations

Quote.Author: Isaac Mizrahi
Quote.QuoteValue: Either it works or it doesn't

Quote.Author: Isaac Mizrahi
Quote.QuoteValue: How do I do it? I don't know how I wouldn't do it - that's the thing

Quote.Author: Isabel Lucas
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no point in dwelling on rejection

Quote.Author: Isabel Lucas
Quote.QuoteValue: I find it tricky to make plans

Quote.Author: Isabel Lucas
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been quiet, more of an observer

Quote.Author: Isabel Lucas
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to keep mobile. It keeps my mind awake

Quote.Author: Isabel Lucas
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a barefoot earth child for a couple of years

Quote.Author: Isabel Lucas
Quote.QuoteValue: My first audition was the worst I have ever done, ever

Quote.Author: Isabel Lucas
Quote.QuoteValue: My dad is a pilot so I think I was born with the travel bug

Quote.Author: Isabel Lucas
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think it's unusual to spend time with your castmate

Quote.Author: Isabel Lucas
Quote.QuoteValue: Mom worked with autistic children

Quote.Author: Isabel Lucas
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really drawn to European films

Quote.Author: Isabeli Fontana
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think of myself as pretty. I am what I am

Quote.Author: Isabeli Fontana
Quote.QuoteValue: It's always nice to be home and be able to see my family. It's the best feeling

Quote.Author: Isabeli Fontana
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up as a tomboy. I hated posing and things like that

Quote.Author: Isabeli Fontana
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to wear whatever I like. I don't care about others' judgment or if it's right or wrong

Quote.Author: Isabeli Fontana
Quote.QuoteValue: Brazilians love to seduce, to have fun, to dance, to charm. We like a little bit of attention

Quote.Author: Isabeli Fontana
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to eat right. Every three hours, small portions. It helps to keep you fit

Quote.Author: Isabeli Fontana
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to work out to look the best possible before the show

Quote.Author: Isabeli Fontana
Quote.QuoteValue: The fashion industry, like others, is constantly changing

Quote.Author: Isabeli Fontana
Quote.QuoteValue: Since I travel too much around the world, I take all these vitamins for my immune system

Quote.Author: Isabeli Fontana
Quote.QuoteValue: If you take the right vitamins and drink enough water, your body flushes everything out for you

Quote.Author: Isabella Rossellini
Quote.QuoteValue: If we are completely honest with ourselves, everyone has a dark side to their personalities

Quote.Author: Isabella Rossellini
Quote.QuoteValue: True elegance for me is the manifestation of an independent mind

Quote.Author: Isabella Rossellini
Quote.QuoteValue: My perfume, Manifesto, was based on the scent of basil

Quote.Author: Isabella Rossellini
Quote.QuoteValue: But my mother loved The Elephant Man, and my father gave David Lynch a scholarship to study in Rome

Quote.Author: Isabella Rossellini
Quote.QuoteValue: To be an icon is a big job - it's beyond acting. And sometimes it pays, and sometimes it doesn't

Quote.Author: Isabella Rossellini
Quote.QuoteValue: The reason of my life is not to be the most beautiful woman in the world

Quote.Author: Isabella Rossellini
Quote.QuoteValue: I am now at an age when they wanted me to play her mother

Quote.Author: Isabella Rossellini
Quote.QuoteValue: I am much more radical in my beliefs than my products represent me to be

Quote.Author: Isabella Rossellini
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of the advertisement is done by saying: first of all, have a complex about who you are

Quote.Author: Isabella Rossellini
Quote.QuoteValue: There is this idea that you have to play heroines or women who succeed

Quote.Author: Isabelle Adjani
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no fear of being less beautiful, I've always been afraid of not being beautiful

Quote.Author: Isabelle Adjani
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothingness not being nothing, nothingness being emptiness

Quote.Author: Isabelle Adjani
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm in an agreeable state: busy, enthusiastic, curious

Quote.Author: Isabelle Adjani
Quote.QuoteValue: I've learned that to expose yourself, to reveal yourself is a test of your humanness

Quote.Author: Isabelle Adjani
Quote.QuoteValue: One is never ready for success. It consecrates and looses you at the same time

Quote.Author: Isabelle Adjani
Quote.QuoteValue: You protect your being when you love yourself better. That's the secret

Quote.Author: Isabelle Adjani
Quote.QuoteValue: Life has brought me work to do on myself these past two years

Quote.Author: Isabelle Adjani
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in angels, so it's simple

Quote.Author: Isabelle Adjani
Quote.QuoteValue: But no one frees himself from being in love in three days

Quote.Author: Isabelle Adjani
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that when you work on yourself, you are attracted by different, more positive beings

Quote.Author: Isaiah Mustafa
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have the athletic ability, why waste it in one sport?

Quote.Author: Isaiah Mustafa
Quote.QuoteValue: When a girl finally texts me back, that ding on the phone is like an angel singing

Quote.Author: Isaiah Mustafa
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a ninja! I like swords and knives and stuff like that

Quote.Author: Isaiah Mustafa
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been acting since 2002, around about there

Quote.Author: Isaiah Mustafa
Quote.QuoteValue: Listen, I'm a big fan of everything on NBC. When I think of comedy on TV, I really think of NBC

Quote.Author: Isaiah Mustafa
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, I stopped being competitive after I played football

Quote.Author: Isaiah Mustafa
Quote.QuoteValue: I played football, honestly, to get a scholarship

Quote.Author: Isaiah Mustafa
Quote.QuoteValue: I love acting. I love performing

Quote.Author: Isaiah Mustafa
Quote.QuoteValue: I like hanging out with people

Quote.Author: Isaiah Mustafa
Quote.QuoteValue: When it comes to me, I know what I can do and can't do

Quote.Author: Isaiah Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: My greatest gift that I have in life is basketball

Quote.Author: Isaiah Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always believed no matter how many shots I miss, I'm going to make the next one

Quote.Author: Isaiah Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to develop your whole game to completion

Quote.Author: Isaiah Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: We decided to go the way of trading and getting younger players

Quote.Author: Isaiah Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: Most players in this league say they want consistency

Quote.Author: Isaiah Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: Larry Brown thought Steve Francis was a Larry Brown type of player

Quote.Author: Isaiah Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: It was important to me to believe, because if I don't believe, how can I expect them to believe?

Quote.Author: Isaiah Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: I love what I'm doing

Quote.Author: Isaiah Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in the players and what I've put together and we'll make it work

Quote.Author: Isaiah Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody wants to be perfect

Quote.Author: Isla Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: I think there is nothing sexier than a handlebar moustache

Quote.Author: Isla Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't underestimate how traumatic divorce is for the children

Quote.Author: Isla Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: Women one hundred percent support each other in the movie industry

Quote.Author: Isla Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're younger, being a redhead is... Well, my two brothers teased me no end

Quote.Author: Isla Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: Family is 100 per cent my top priority

Quote.Author: Isla Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: An easy way to get people to like you is to make them laugh

Quote.Author: Isla Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: I love marriage. I think it's a wonderful institution and it's the most important decision you make

Quote.Author: Isla Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: I think there is nothing sexier than laughter lines

Quote.Author: Isla Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a mother is by far my greatest accomplishment

Quote.Author: Isla Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: I love Monty Python, Black Adder, Fawlty Towers. I'm a huge fan of British comedy

Quote.Author: Israel Horovitz
Quote.QuoteValue: You write a play mostly out of yourself. There's a need to get a certain thing down

Quote.Author: Israel Horovitz
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in Wakefield, Mass., and there were only a couple of Jewish families in the town

Quote.Author: Israel Horovitz
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been a fighter - it's always been a part of my personality

Quote.Author: Israel Horovitz
Quote.QuoteValue: I've done nothing with my life but write plays

Quote.Author: Israel Horovitz
Quote.QuoteValue: If work isn't rooted in comedy, people will turn from it, or they'll use it like soap opera

Quote.Author: Israel Horovitz
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a visceral response to a memory of working-class life

Quote.Author: Israel Horovitz
Quote.QuoteValue: I am an internationally produced playwright

Quote.Author: Israel Horovitz
Quote.QuoteValue: I write because I don't know how to ask my questions any other way

Quote.Author: Israel Horovitz
Quote.QuoteValue: Radical politics tend to be simple minded

Quote.Author: Israel Horovitz
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe all theatre is going to be irrelevant for all time

Quote.Author: Issey Miyake
Quote.QuoteValue: The purpose - where I start - is the idea of use. It is not recycling, it's reuse

Quote.Author: Issey Miyake
Quote.QuoteValue: By the way, Marilyn Monroe was a size 14

Quote.Author: Issey Miyake
Quote.QuoteValue: Design is not for philosophy it's for life

Quote.Author: Issey Miyake
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never been involved in any kind of political movement

Quote.Author: Issey Miyake
Quote.QuoteValue: I was always interested in making clothing that is worn by people in the real world

Quote.Author: Issey Miyake
Quote.QuoteValue: Paris is an old and traditional place; it needs new blood

Quote.Author: Issey Miyake
Quote.QuoteValue: My design is no design

Quote.Author: Issey Miyake
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather look to the future than to the past

Quote.Author: Issey Miyake
Quote.QuoteValue: There are no boundaries for what can be fabric

Quote.Author: Issey Miyake
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not create a fashionable aesthetic... I create a style based on life

Quote.Author: Italo Calvino
Quote.QuoteValue: I suffer from everyday life

Quote.Author: Italo Calvino
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a Communist, fully convinced and dedicated to my cause

Quote.Author: Italo Calvino
Quote.QuoteValue: A classic is a book that has never finished saying what it has to say

Quote.Author: Italo Calvino
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not the voice that commands the story; it is the ear

Quote.Author: Italo Calvino
Quote.QuoteValue: The human race is a zone of living things that should be defined by tracing its confines

Quote.Author: Italo Calvino
Quote.QuoteValue: In love, as in gluttony, pleasure is a matter of the utmost precision

Quote.Author: Italo Calvino
Quote.QuoteValue: The more enlightened our houses are, the more their walls ooze ghosts

Quote.Author: Italo Calvino
Quote.QuoteValue: I detest this contemporary trend to destroy the traditional hierarchy of genres

Quote.Author: Italo Calvino
Quote.QuoteValue: Reading is a possession, a march toward a possession

Quote.Author: Italo Calvino
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm afraid I don't think I really have a life on which something can be written

Quote.Author: Itzhak Perlman
Quote.QuoteValue: That makes classical music work, the ability to improvise

Quote.Author: Itzhak Perlman
Quote.QuoteValue: I can tell you that many soloists probably wish they could sit

Quote.Author: Itzhak Perlman
Quote.QuoteValue: So many things can drive you mad as a child, not only music

Quote.Author: Itzhak Perlman
Quote.QuoteValue: Any gifted child can potentially get in real trouble because of the way they are handled

Quote.Author: Itzhak Perlman
Quote.QuoteValue: I listen to kids play a lot

Quote.Author: Itzhak Perlman
Quote.QuoteValue: There are people who are uncanny, who are finished products at a young age. I wasn't, thank God

Quote.Author: Itzhak Perlman
Quote.QuoteValue: Child prodigy is a curse because you've got all those terrible possibilities

Quote.Author: Itzhak Perlman
Quote.QuoteValue: The most important thing to do is really listen

Quote.Author: Itzhak Perlman
Quote.QuoteValue: I have just one fiddle. It works, and that's it. It has been an old friend

Quote.Author: Itzhak Perlman
Quote.QuoteValue: Only one of my grandchildren is serious about a musical instrument. The others dabble in it

Quote.Author: Ivan Glasenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: You're doing a major merger, you got to hope you didn't get it wrong. That's the view of any CEO

Quote.Author: Ivan Glasenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: It's easy to buy. Prove that you bought at the right time and the right price

Quote.Author: Ivan Glasenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: We always look at opportunities. We are not aggressively looking to buy something

Quote.Author: Ivan Glasenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I stopped focusing on people being different, and I started treating everyone the same way

Quote.Author: Ivan Glasenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: The trading side of the business means a lot of travel, being out of the office a lot of time

Quote.Author: Ivan Glasenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I've said I will be CEO as long as my colleagues want me

Quote.Author: Ivan Glasenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: We're all shareholders. These guys below me, they see the CEO taking it easy, it's their money

Quote.Author: Ivan Glasenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of deals are done or not done because chief executives are not fully aligned to shareholders

Quote.Author: Ivan Glasenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Why should I build an asset when I can buy it more cheaply than you can build it?

Quote.Author: Ivan Glasenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never opened a glass of champagne on any acquisition. Bankers do that

Quote.Author: Ivan Lendl
Quote.QuoteValue: If I don't practice the way I should, then I won't play the way that I know I can

Quote.Author: Ivan Lendl
Quote.QuoteValue: It's flattering to be compared in any way to Tiger Woods, because he's the best player in the world

Quote.Author: Ivan Lendl
Quote.QuoteValue: If you lose, it hurts, but as long as you have fought hard, you can still feel good about yourself

Quote.Author: Ivan Lendl
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy life. I always enjoy jokes

Quote.Author: Ivan Lendl
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to focus on the process. You cannot be glued to the results

Quote.Author: Ivan Lendl
Quote.QuoteValue: I got bad calls every match, and I never got an apology. So I thought it was rather strange

Quote.Author: Ivan Lendl
Quote.QuoteValue: I was between 2 and 3 in the world for two, three years. That's not exactly where I wanted to be

Quote.Author: Ivan Lendl
Quote.QuoteValue: Not winning at Wimbledon is not going to bother me forever

Quote.Author: Ivan Lendl
Quote.QuoteValue: You know how kids are. They like to do what parents do

Quote.Author: Ivan Lendl
Quote.QuoteValue: Too many people asking too many questions in tennis. Golf is better

Quote.Author: Ivan Reitman
Quote.QuoteValue: Also watching a movie on DVD is different than watching it in the theater

Quote.Author: Ivan Reitman
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think my sense of humor has changed at all; I was born with this, for better or for worse

Quote.Author: Ivan Reitman
Quote.QuoteValue: I love horror and sci-fi

Quote.Author: Ivan Reitman
Quote.QuoteValue: I never like to do parodies. I never do. It's just not my style of comedy

Quote.Author: Ivan Reitman
Quote.QuoteValue: I think Junior is certainly a science fiction premise as is Twins, as is Dave, beyond Ghostbusters

Quote.Author: Ivan Reitman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd always been a science fiction enthusiast

Quote.Author: Ivan Reitman
Quote.QuoteValue: In a comedy it helps enhance things that were already there

Quote.Author: Ivan Reitman
Quote.QuoteValue: It's sort of the most important thing for acting, is to listen to the person you're dealing with

Quote.Author: Ivan Reitman
Quote.QuoteValue: My sense is, I think it's okay for directors to do movies that speak to other work in their career

Quote.Author: Ivan Reitman
Quote.QuoteValue: We got some devastating reviews on Animal House at the start

Quote.Author: Ivan Turgenev
Quote.QuoteValue: We sit in the mud... and reach for the stars

Quote.Author: Ivan Turgenev
Quote.QuoteValue: Most people can't understand how others can blow their noses differently than they do

Quote.Author: Ivan Turgenev
Quote.QuoteValue: Death's an old joke, but each individual encounters it anew

Quote.Author: Ivan Turgenev
Quote.QuoteValue: Women... can't live with 'em... can't shoot 'em

Quote.Author: Ivan Turgenev
Quote.QuoteValue: The word tomorrow was invented for indecisive people and for children

Quote.Author: Ivan Turgenev
Quote.QuoteValue: Who among us has the strength to oppose petty egoism, those petty good feelings, pity and remorse?

Quote.Author: Ivan Turgenev
Quote.QuoteValue: Circumstances define us; they force us onto one road or another, and then they punish us for it

Quote.Author: Ivan Turgenev
Quote.QuoteValue: However much you knock at nature's door, she will never answer you in comprehensible words

Quote.Author: Ivan Turgenev
Quote.QuoteValue: I agree with no one's opinion. I have some of my own

Quote.Author: Ivan Turgenev
Quote.QuoteValue: There are some moments in life, some feelings; one can only point to them and pass by

Quote.Author: Ivana Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: Looking good is the best revenge

Quote.Author: Ivana Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't get mad. Get everything!

Quote.Author: Ivana Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is life, so try to enjoy it. You only have one life

Quote.Author: Ivana Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: I always felt very secure and very safe with real estate. Real estate always appreciates
